mapper.select: SELECT ACCOUNT_ID, LEDGER_ID, TYPE, NAME, CURRENT_BALANCE, ARCHIVED, CREATED_AT FROM ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{id} AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT ACCOUNT_ID, LEDGER_ID, TYPE, NAME, CURRENT_BALANCE, ARCHIVED, CREATED_AT FROM ACCOUNT WHERE LEDGER_ID = #{ledgerId} ORDER BY ARCHIVED ASC, ACCOUNT_ID DESC, NAME ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT ( ACCOUNT_ID, LEDGER_ID, TYPE, NAME, CURRENT_BALANCE, ARCHIVED, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{ledgerId}, #{type}, #{name}, #{currentBalance}, NVL(#{archived}, 'N'), NVL(#{createdAt}, SYSTIMESTAMP) )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET LEDGER_ID = #{ledgerId}, TYPE = #{type}, NAME = #{name}, CURRENT_BALANCE = #{currentBalance}, ARCHIVED = NVL(#{archived}, 'N') WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}
